channel.title: Allstar Remake
channel.description:
Hey guys!
I'm attempting to remake allstar, as in make it more better and stable.
I chose to do this on allstar because allstar was the first server I worked on, I really liked it and I still do. I prefer allstar more than PI or Delta.
I'm working on the following things, for now:
(Green = done, Orange = working on, Red = not started yet)
[color=green]-Anti-Null [color=green]-Fixed dupes (telegrab and trade dupe) - Move home - Lower XP Rate a little bit - Remove unneeded codes - Remake training - Replace skilling - Replace capslocked kid with tourette syndrome text - Remake teleports - Remake shops
Skills: Magic Runecrafting Smithing Mining Fishing Slayer Cooking Woodcutting Fletching Firemaking Prayer Herblore Thieving Crafting
Home: [IMG]http://img826.imageshack.us/img826/9465/homecj.png[/img]
Only picture I can get atm, going to get more :)

item.title: Allstar Remake
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“im0wnag3, post:14, topic:431425”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=534104.msg3906339#msg3906339 date=1328251802]
Even with a good programmer, the source still sucks.
[/quote]

because you suck in programming doesn’t mean everyone is.[/quote]blolool0l0l.w230-5 My little cousin who is 1 month old could program something this easy. Nothing to someone2, but if he wants to learn programming then do something a bit more advanced, if he is just doing it from the loalz then so be it.

Read full topic

item.title: Allstar Remake
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:3, topic:431425”]Try to change the ‘safe’ and ‘wild’ areas. Instead of having the server read what areas are SAFE, have it read what areas are not safe. There’s less coordinates, if you know what I’m trying to say…[/quote]It’s just one line of code that needs to be removed for this to happen.

Goodluck, I support using allstar over pi, mostly because I have a soft spot for classic servers.

Read full topic

@someone2 wrote:

Hey guys!

I’m attempting to remake allstar, as in make it more better and stable.

I chose to do this on allstar because allstar was the first server I worked on, I really liked it and I still do. I prefer allstar more than PI or Delta.

I’m working on the following things, for now:

(Green = done, Orange = working on, Red = not started yet)
